TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1922: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1928), 3 vols., Vol 2, pp. 894
TEI.2.document_title: Anthony Butler to Stephen F Austin, 11-30-1832

barker_notes.barker_summary: Anthony Butler to Austin, November 30, 1832. Order for $38.
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 894

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*Anthony Butler to Austin, November 30, 1832. Order for $38.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*San Felipe*/location_mentioned* *date_mentioned n="11-30-1832">Nov 30th 1832*/date_mentioned**/p* *p**person_mentioned*Col S. F. Austin*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*Will please pay *person_mentioned*Lemuel Crawford*/person_mentioned* or order thirty eight dollars for work done on *location_mentioned**person_mentioned*Col Anthony Butler*/person_mentioned*s building*/location_mentioned* in this place, which charge to a/c*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Anthony Butler*/person_mentioned**/p* *p*by *person_mentioned*Jno. K. Jones, Agent*/person_mentioned*,*/p* *p*Pay *person_mentioned*Jno. E. Jones*/person_mentioned* or order for value recd *date_mentioned n="12-01-1832">Dec. lst 1832*/date_mentioned**/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Lemuel Crawford*/person_mentioned**/p* *p*Recd. Payment in full *date_mentioned n="01-13-1833">Jany 13th 1833*/date_mentioned*.*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Jno. B. Jones*/person_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
